inn1.comm: starts off with a wide way outside the off stump
closer to the batsman on length, the batsman defends it back
hint of swing as this one is a touch fuller outside off, the batsman defends it back
goes wider outside off, Shahzad slashes but can't connect as it goes to mid-off
fuller on off stump, pushed down towards mid-on for one
good-length ball towards off, Karim defends towards mid-on and gets off the mark with a quick single
wider outside off and it's another wide as Shahzad chased it
length delivery just outside off, Shahzad goes on the backfoot to defend
beats him straightaway with turn outside the off stump
loud appeal for lbw but this one was going down the leg side after hitting hims and there was an inside edge too
tucked to the leg side from length for a quick single
on length on the leg stump again for one more
on target this time on the middle stump, the batsman defends it back
on the stumps again, the batsman leans forward to block it
slightly back of length outside off, guides it to point off the backfoot

oh the slower one has done it! Rubel rolled his fingers over the ball for the short of length ball which pitched outside off, it came in after pitching and Shahzad was beaten as he was trapped in front of the stumps around the knee roll and Bowden raised his finger
angled outside off on length, guides it to third man for one
another lbw appeal, this one is turned down. It came in sharply from back of length and the batsman was hit in front of leg and slightly high on the pad
on length outside off, pushed to cover off the frontfoot
another appeal to end the over. It pitched on length around leg and was going down further so Billy Bowden shook his head
leans forward to block the length ball
full on middle, pushed back to the bowler
full on off, he goes hard at it to drive it to long-off
short of length and outside off he picks the gap between point and cover point
bit of turn from length around off, he guided it to backward point and there was a mix up, but the batsman came back in time
on length on off, defends it towards cover to end the over
length delivery on the middle stumps, the batsman defends it back
on middle stump, defends it towards mid-off
strays on the leg stump, he tucks it off the pads towards deep square leg and the fielder does well to kick the ball inside to keep it to two. There was time for the third, though
appeal for lbw as it pitched on length and came in to hit the back pad in front go middle. Looked very close but maybe was doing too much to go down leg or just hit it
appeal for lbw as it pitched on length and came in to hit the back pad in front go middle. Looked very close but maybe was doing too much to go down leg or just hit it
slower one on length outside off, Shahzad drives delicately and gets a thin edge but fall short of the keeper
beaten outside the off stump with some turn as he tried to defend it
comes down the track and blasts it in the air between mid-off and cover for a welcome boundary
full on middle and leg, driven to mid-on with the turn for one
comes down the track to defend the length ball outside off
defends the ball outside off with soft hands towards point
loud appeal for lbw as the batsman went back to cut it outside off and got an inside edge onto his pad so the appeal was turned down
oh that was mighty close! Hint of outswing with the ball angled across the batsman who tried to defend it without nay footwork
length delivery on the leg stump this time, defends it to cover
touch shorter and aimed at the middle stump, defends it back to the bowler
slower one outside off and full, guides it to third man for one
length ball outside off, Sadiq defends it back
another one outside off on length, pushed towards cover this time
turning towards leg on length, helped with the turn to the leg side
appeal for lbw as he tries to sweep it from outside off and was struck outside the line
touch shorter and turning in form outside off, pushed back to the bowler
back of length around off, helped with the turn to the leg side
strays down the leg side and the batsman manages his pad on it as it foes fine down the leg side for four runs
short of length around middle and leg, turned to square leg
takes a step down and guides the ball from outside off to third man
short of length on middle, he pulls but can't middle and it still goes past midwicket for two
touch fuller on the leg stump, tucked to short midwicket
slower one on the leg stump, helps it easily to midwicket
pulled away nicely this time as it was much shorter and Naijibullah got on top of it to pull it to the midwicket boundary
slower one on length outside off, drives it slightly in the air towards short cover
full on off stump from round the wicket, pushed to cover
comes down and defends the ball on middle back to the bowler
length ball right on the stumps, the batsman leans forward and blocks
comes down and it was on leg stump, he got only a bit of bat as it went down fine to short fine leg
comes down to whip it to leg bt missed and they sneak a leg bye as the ball goes behind square on off
length delivery on off stump, he leans and blocks
edges first ball with a push outside off as it came in and it fell short of first slip
on the off stump, defends it back to the bowler
he charges down to smash it back and the bowler gets a hand to it
on length on the off stump, pushed down to mid-on
closer to middle stump now, turned to the leg side in the deep for one
angled in from outside off, the batsman wanted the single after pushing towards cover but he was sent back by the non-striker
right on target not he middle stump, Sadiq pushes it to cover
Sadiq comes down and breaks some shackles! He charged and lofted the ball straight and high over the bowler's head for a six towards the sight screen
on middle and leg, tucked to midwicket but he is denied the single
on middle stump, defends it back to the bowler
short delivery on the stumps, he still can't put it away. Hits it straight to midwicket

he has fallen under pressure! Sunny bowled a slightly slower one towards middle, Sadiq played the shot a bit early while pushing it back and a leading edge from close to the sticker of the bat went back to the bowler for an easy catch
on length from outside off, pushed towards cover
angled in towards off on length, pushed to point while looking for one
almost gave it back! This also keeps slow and it almost carried as he pushed it back
towards middle and leg, steered to midwicket
flighted on off, driven back to the bowler
angled in towards middle, pushed down the ground to long-on for one to avoid the maiden
outside the leg stump and swept easily to deep fine leg. That was two runs but Stanikzai didn't want the second and Najibullah nearly got run out at the non-striker's end and but made it back in time
on the off stump, pushed straight to cover
touch shorter outside off, pushed down firmly to long-off

oh the ball's gone through him! Najibullah came down the track as the ball pitched around leg and was angled towards middle, and he played with a strange angle of the bat, keeping it horizontal, and the ball went right through. He couldn't get anywhere close to it
on length on off, he defends it back
on length well outside off, pushed straight to cover
length ball on middle, turned to midwicket easily
pushed down the ground with the turn to long-on for one
defends towards cover against the turn
drives it back from length and the bowler does well to stop it
there is no deep square leg and the batsman does well to sweep it right between short fine leg and square leg for four
on length closer to off, drives it down to long-on for one
on length on the off stump, blocks after leaning forward
angled towards the pads, defends on the leg side for a quick single
comes down and drives it inside out back to the bowler
not much turn as he tries to cut it after going back and gets an inside edge
straight delivery and it's defended back to the bowler
outside off, he tries to cut off the backfoot and misses it completely
length delivery coming in form outside off, he defends it off the backfoot
short of length outside off, driven square beautifully off the backfoot for one
length ball outside off, solid defence on the off side by Stanikzai
short of length outside off, punched off the backfoot to sweeper cover for a single
back of length just outside off, defends it back to the bowler
short of length outside off, he goes back and cuts it between point and third man for two
angled in sharply from off and hits him on the back pad, loud appeal for lbw but it was probably going down leg
on the off stump this time, defends it off the backfoot
punched off the backfoot to cover and the fielder throws it to the non-striker's end for overthrows
full on the stumps, driven down to long-off for one
angled in from outside off, defends it back to the bowler
right on target on the stumps, defends it back again
on length just outside off, defends it to cover
touch fuller outside off, drives it on off side
comes down the track and defends it back
closer to the stumps, blocks it on the pitch
close to off on length, pushed to cover
gives a bit of room outside off, drives it to sweeper cover for one to avoid the maiden and it's time for drinks
oh that is a change of intent! He steps out to reach the pitch of the delivery and drives it past mid-on! That's a beautiful shot
steps out again, but this is a short one. The batsman punches it to long off
allows the ball to come in, then nudges it to deep square leg off the front foot
flat and short! The batsman was deep in the crease and punched it back down the pitch, but it hits the stumps at the other end
flatter and shorter again, he stays back and punches it to deep cover for a single
tossed up delivery on the middle and leg line, the batsman takes a step down the pitch and eases it to long on for a single
tossed up and slow, the batsman reaches out and drives it to deep cover for a single

oh there is a sudden change of intent here.. Now Mangal steps down the pitch, but is nowhere near the pitch of the delivery, he still goes through with the shot and gets a thick edge over backward point
stays in the crease and pushes it back to the bowler
skips out of the crease again, but punches this straight to cover
this time, he stays back and defends it down the pitch
gets a boundary of the last ball, but not how he would have wanted it! Goes for a cut, but gets an outside edge past the keeper. That runs down quickly to the boundary
back of length delivery on off, the batsman manages to pick up a single with a dab to cover
he keeps it tight on the stumps, Mangal defends to midwicket
little bit of width, but the length is perfect.. The batsman pushes it straight to cover off the back foot
rolls his fingers over this one, but it's short enough for the batsman to punch to deep cover for a single
back of length delivery on the stumps, Stanikzai defends it down the pitch
slower and fuller, the batsman stays patient and pushes it to cover
he tosses it up and the batsman responds by coming down the pitch, hits it straight back to the bowler

it's a run-out! Afghanistan lose another one and this was a bit unnecessary. The batsman dabbed this one towards cover and thought about a single. By the time he was sent back by the non-striker, the fielder had come in, swooped the ball and fired a quick throw to the keeper. The leg umpire didn't even think about asking the third umpire..
tossed up delivery, much slower.. The batsman defends it to off
he comes forward and defends it to cover
picks up a single to long off with a back foot punch
full outside off, driven to long-off for one
defends off the backfoot to cover
full delivery outside off, driven past cover for one
half-tracker to the leg side, helped to deep midwicket for one
full delivery on off, driven back to the bowler
turning away from off and an outside edge goes to third man for one
tuning away from length outside off, driven to cover at the dye of the circle
inside edge onto the pads and it goes on the off side
driven off the front foot to deep cover for one
defends with soft hands to off side but no time for a run
defends with soft hands between point and short third man
comes down and a thick edge goes past midwicket for one
length ball on middle, turned to the leg side for one
good-length ball on the stumps, pushed down past the bowler for one
short of length around off, turned to del backward square leg for two
keeps a bit low on off stump, guides it to the leg side for one more
slower one from outside off, pushed past cover for a single
aimed towards the off stump, pushed back as it keeps a bit slow
tries to sweep the ball fro outside off but can't connect and leads to a stifled appeal because it hit him outside off
goes to the backfoot and pulls gets an inside edge to the leg side
short of length outside off, pushed down to long off
goes back to swat it to the leg side but it keeps low and inside edge goes to the leg side
one more falls! Mominul pitched it up outside off, turned it away and the batsman drove with a lot of force only to give an outside edge to first slip where Nasir took a sharp catch
full on off, digs it out back to the bowler
short of length on the off stumps, defends it back to the bowler
touch fuller on off, turned to the leg side for one
short of length outside off with some extra bounce as the batsman tried to cut it late but missed and so did the keeper for a bye
short of length on middle, keeps low, and it's tucked to square leg
on length outside off, drives it straight to cover
angled towards leg from off, steered to deep backward square leg into the gap for two runs
drifting in from outside off, chopped to point off the backfoot
short of length well outside off, punched down to long-off
on length on off, defends with soft hands to cover point
short of length outside off, pushed to cover off the backfoot
on length outside off, outside edge goes past the keeper for two
on length on off, pushed down to long-off
on the off stump on length, defends it back to the bowler
touch fuller on the stumps, steered to midwicket
short of length on middle, whipped to deep midwicekt for two quick runs which complete Afghanistan's 100
back of length outside off, punched to sweeper cover for one
length ball angled towards off, thick edge goes to third man
on the pads now, flicked to deep backward square leg
keeps low after pitching on length on off, defended back to the bowler
well outside off, slashed to sweeper cover for one
turns away from length outside off, helped to deep point for one more
defends to cover off the front foot
on the front foot again, driven firmly to cover this time
drives it down to long-off for a single
back of length around off, defends it to cover
back of length towards middle, turned to deep fine leg for one
short of length around off, guides to point by opening the face of the bat
drives it back to the bowler who stops the ball with his leg and the ball goes to mid-on and the batsman is back in time in the crease
length delivery around off, tucked a little wide of midwicket but the fielder does well to stop it
sweeps the ball in the air from well outside off to deep backward square leg
on length outside off, pushed towards cover with soft hands
drives outside off and a thick edge goes past first slip to deep third man
pushed to cover point off the backfoot after the turn
drives it down the ground to long-off
leans forward and blocks it back to the bowler
beaten outside the off stump and it was very close to the off stump too
on the pads now, steered to deep backward square leg for two
full and wide, driven to sweeper cover for an easy single
on length on the off stump, turned to deep midwicket
angled towards the leg stump, flicked towards midwicket for a quick single
keeps low after pitching on short of length outside off, the batsman defends it back
pitched outside off, pushed to cover
touch shorter around off, pushes it on the off side
mid-on is in the circle and the batsman clears him with a lofted drive down the ground for a one-bounce four
tucks it to midwicket off the backfoot
length ball on the middle stump, defends to short cover
full delivery on the off stump, drives it down to long-off for one more
short of length outside off, punched to cover at the edge of the circle
touch fuller, pushed to cover off the backfoot
short of length around middle, tucked to backward square leg
appeal for caught behind down the leg side but the umpire says no. It probably took the pad a the batsman tried to play it fine
tries to cut it outside off but misses
length ball on the stumps, defends it back to the bowler
down the leg side, goes off the pads to the leg side
on the pads again, helped to short fine leg this time
touch shorter outside off, stays a bit slow and the batsman pushes it back, slightly in the air, past the bowler
full delivery is pushed back to Arafat
full ball again, pushed down to long-on for a single
slightly short outside off, cuts it straight t cover at the edge of the circle and it's drinks
slightly short outside off, driven square to cover point off the back foot
goes way down the leg side for a wide
on length outside off and he slashes at it to place it between point and cover point for a four
stays a bit slow outside off, pushed back to the bowler
another wide down the leg side as the batsman tries to sweep
pitched up on middle, defends it back to the bowler
short of length outside off, cuts it to point
full and slightly flighted outside off, drives it towards cover
outside off, drives it hard past cover wide of long-off for two runs
quicker one outside off, he cuts but misses
on length on middle stump, the batsman can't connect properly
charges down for the length ball, can't time it properly and it goes to long-on for one
on length outside off, cut straight to point off the backfoot
outside off on length, pushed straight to cover
on the pads, flicked wide of midwicket for one
on length on middle and leg, tucked to the leg side for one more
nearly in the block hole, defends it back to the bowler
towards the leg stump, he tries to sweep but gets hit on the pad
he connects well this time as he gets another loose delivery outside leg, and sweeps it away for four
gets room well outside off now and he frees his arms to drive it powerfully through the covers for four more. Great over for Afghanistan

nearly takes a great catch! Stanikzai played across the line and got a leading edge going towards deep cover, Nasir Hossain ran towards the boundary with his eyes on the ball, dived too, but it was just out of his reach. He has injured himself a bit, but is fit to field again
length ball outside off, pushed to the off side
full delivery outside off, pushed straight to point
short ball on middle, pulls it to deep square leg
on length outside off, drives it dan to long-off
shot and wide and Shenwari cuts it fiercely to the cover boundary for a four
Rubel is back into the attack, Asghar goes for a massive slog, length ball, thick inside edge onto the pads and past the keeper for four to fine leg
short of length ball outside off, looks to slash it through cover and misses
full ball is drilled down the ground towards long-off
full ball slanting in towards middle, punched towards long-on
length ball outside off, slashed towards cover
full and outside off, looks to thump it and misses
length ball down the ground, slammed towards deep backward square leg for four
flighted and full, pushed back towards the bowler
length ball well outside off, mistimed carve towards cover
yorker, dug out towards midwicket
another full ball, squeezed out behind square leg
short of length ball outside off, cracks it fiercely but he can't beat the man at cover, just a few yards either side and that would have been four
slammed towards deep square leg this time
low full toss is thumped towards extra cover for a single
what a way to get to his half-century, Stanikzai latches on to a length ball and clobbers it over long-on, huge six
short and wide, that was a ball that should have been put away, it was slightly slower as well, slapped towards point but can't place it for runs
short of length ball, well outside off, this time they make it count, gets back in the crease and crashes it past point for four
superb stroke to reach his fifty, well outside off, Shenwari gets on the front foot and slaps it behind point for four
reverse-sweep this time, was that a drop? no think it dropped just short of point, well struck but the fielder gets a hand on it
pushed towards cover, can't get the run
worked towards midwicket
another massive hit, skips down the track to get to the length of the ball and sends that into orbit., way beyond the sightscreen, what a shot that is
finds the gap again! It pitched on leg and Shenwari slammed it to the wide long-on boundary right in the gap for four
strays down the leg side for a wide
tries to cut it by making room but doesn't connect and loses his balances but manages to stay in the crease
full on the pads, flicked to wide long-on boundary for two
low full toss on off, driven straight to cover
nearly in the block hole, he makes room and digs it out to cover for one
full on middle and Stanikzai lofts it down the ground for four more! He struck it right over the bowler's head to bisect the gap between long on and long off. 13 off the over
attempted yorker, Stanikzai gets his toes out of the way just in time and flicks it with a thick edge to the deep fine leg boundary for four
tries to slash it outside off, the ball was just in from the wide line
low full toss on the legs, flicked in the air to deep midwicket
slightly higher full toss, driven down to long-on for one
slogs again to the leg side, doesn't connect from the middle but it goes to deep backward square leg
scoops it for a one-bounce four! He knew an attempted yorker was coming, it was a low full toss and he moved to the off stump and scooped it well over short fine leg for a boundary
another full toss and it's dispatched to the midwicket boundary! He had it in his zone and whipped it to leg and beat the fielder in the deep
slams the full delivery back, but straight to mid-off
tries to slash at the full delivery outside off but can't connect
misses the full ball outside off again as it goes to the keeper
137kph, moves across this time to move it to leg but only gets an inside edge to the keeper

dropped! Full toss to end the over outside off, he lofted it towards deep cover, the fielder could have caught it easily and well inside the boundary line but he misjudged it and it went right through his hands
makes room, punches it down to long-off for one
full and outside off, driven firmly to cover at the edge of the circle
flatter and on middle, Shenwari slogs it to deep midwicket

dropped again and that too off a full toss, and it's the second one from Imrul Kayes! Full toss was slammed high in the air to the leg side, two fielders came under it and Imrul got his hands under it but it popped out of his hands
lofts a full delivery straight down the ground to long-on

and six now! He came down the track, Razzak bowled it full and wide, but Stanikzai some how connected and cleared the long-off boundary even though it was not a straight-bat shot. both batsmen on 80 now
wanted to scoop it from outside off, but can't connect and they scamper for a leg bye
slower one at 115kph, but it was full and it was slammed down to long-on after a bounce
kapow, that's gone out of the ground! Stanikzai got a full delivery and clobbered it to the cow corner boundary for a massive six
wide full toss outside off, he swivels his bat to clear the infield and that runs away for four more. These batsmen have left the hosts clueless

oh it's a run out! Stanikzai couldn't connect with the ball that kept low outside off and Shenwari came across for a run meanwhile. The keeper passes the ball to the bowler and both batsmen are caught at the same end. Shenwari gets a lot of pats on his back as soon as he crosses the boundary rope
slogs and misses. It was outside off again, he went down on a knee to slog it to the leg side but the ball kept low again

inn2.comm: length ball on the leg stump, pushed towards mid-on
good-length delivery outside off, drives it to point with the angle
oh extra bounce. Back of length delivery outside off, Anamul gets off the mark by guiding it to third man
loud appeal for lbw, but turned down! It pitched on middle and angled into the batsman to cramp him for room and hit him slightly high on the pad

oh what a beauty, that went right through Shamsur! Length delivery on the off stump nips in a tad and goes through the defence of the batsman, who played for the angle of the ball. The off stump goes for a walk, Shapoor roars and is mobbed by his team-mates
angled in from outside off on length, Mominul defends it carefully
length ball outside off, drives it to the off side
slightly back of length on middle, defends it towards midwicket
touch shorter outside off, defends towards cover
hint of outswing after pitching on length on off, batsman was squared up a bit while defending
super extra bounce after it pitched wide outside off and shot towards the keeper

loud appeal for lbw and Bowden's crooked finger goes up! He angled it in from length around off and it hit the batsman in front of the leg stump, Bowden took his time for the decision, but from the first look it looked like it would have missed the leg stump
thick edge goes to third man after Mominul wanted to leave it outside off but couldn't get his bat out of the way on time
full and wide outside off, driven to point where the fielder dives to his left but the batsmen have time for one
angled in towards the batsman from length outside off, defends it back to the bowler
touch fuller around off, whipped, but not firmly, towards mid-on
fuller outside off and this one is flicked well past mid-on in the gap for three runs

beautiful cover drive! It was a gentle drive, not a firm one, and it caressed along the ground right through the covers to go to the boundary. But Nabi chased it and dived to pull it in. Was it clean? Seems like he has done well to just keep the ball inside the boundary and he saves a run
length delivery close to off, Mushfiqur defends it on the off side, kept a bit low
on the pads and Mushfiqur flicks it beautifully on the leg side, he makes it look easy and that's gone all the way to the boundary
back of length ball this time, the batsman defends it
length delivery outside off, he leaves it alone
fuller one well outside off, it's called a wide
angled in towards the batsman, whipped to the leg side for one
back of length outside off, gets a lot of bounce as it's left alone
137kph, short ball angled in and Mominul defends it back
another short one and Mominul knew it was coming, he pulls it stylishly past midwicket and that's a cracking four
around length this time outside off and Mominul flicks it with a foot forward, past midwicket again, for three runs
length ball angled across outside off, batsman leaves it
better delivery as he brings this one closer to the batsmen, but he leaves it again
length ball outside off, he played it to the leg side but a thick edge races away between point and cover point for two
beats him outside off with the angle now with a length delivery as Mominul poked at it
touch fuller outside off, drives it square to point
138kph, full and extremely wide outside off, that's a wide
that's a lot of bounce for a mere bad of length ball and it went past the outside edge again
length ball outside off and closer to the batsman, left alone now
full and just outside off, driven straight to point
length ball outside off, Mushfiqur guides it to point
touch shorter and angled across, he defends it towards short cover
slightly closer to the off stump, Mushfiqur gets an edge onto his pads as it keeps a bit low
back of length around off, he defends it back
he guides the back of length ball to gully where a misfield gives him a single
full and just outside off, whipped away beautifully along the ground past mid-on for a four by Mominul. He's looking in great touch
he chases the short of length ball outside off and it just misses the outside edge
similar length but closer to the batsman, defends it to short cover
keeps a bit low around off, he does well to get bat on it
fuller and outside off, drives it to cover
shorter one outside off, keeps a bit low again and he defends it towards cover
full and outside off, driven straight past the bowler but mid-on does well to keep it to one
drifting in towards off, defends it back
full on off, whipped to long-on for one
flighted delivery on off, defended back to the bowler
fuller outside off, driven down to mid-off
goes a bit short outside off and Mominul cuts it off the backfoot past point for a four
on length on off, defends it to cover
length ball outside off, left alone by the batsman
back of length towards middle, turned to square leg for one
full delivery around off and look at that - Mominul flicks it between midwicket and mid-on for a four. It's a fast outfield and it races away
angled across this time form length, batsman leaves it alone
back of length outside off, pushed to cover
139kph, similar length and angled across, he looks to poke and misses
turning in form outside off on length, Mushfiqur goes back and cuts it past short third man for two
touch fuller and closer to off, turned to the leg side for one
slightly full outside off, drives it to sweeper cover for a single
touch shorter and outside off, defends it back
back of length around off, tucked to short fine leg
slightly fuller around off, pushed down to mid-on
length ball around off, Mominul defends it carefully
strays down the leg side and the batsman helps it along the way for four fine on the leg side
back of length outside off, beautifully-timed late cut from Mominul to the right of point, but there is a third man there
127kph, length ball outside off, Mushfiqur defends it back
touch shorter outside off, he guides it to point
slightly wide outside off, helps it point again
on length just outside off, defended back to the bowler
touch shorter and Mominul cuts it late to backward point
slightly shorter outside off, turned to leg off the backfoot for one
turning in from outside off, steered to midwicket for one more
flighted around middle and leg, appeal for lbw and it looked close, umpire turns it down. Might be going down leg
on length outside off, defended on the off side with a lean forward
short of length outside off and angled in, cuts to point off the backfoot
outside off again, cuts it late to third man for one
134kph, beaten by pace as Mominul tries to cut this ball outside off and misses it
fuller on leg stump, flicked to midwicket
strays down the leg side and Mominul helps it to fine leg
length ball outside off, Mushfiqur defends it towards cover
flighted well outside off, Mominul chased it to drive and missed, the keeper also missed it and Bangladesh get four byes
flighted outside off, Mominul leans forward and blocks
touch shorter and closer to off, the batsman goes back to cut it to point
fuller and outside off, he drives it late to short third man
on length around off, cut to point off the backfoot
on he leg stump, pushed to midwicket for one
back of length around off, inside edge hits the pad and they sneak a single
back of length outside off, jabbed to third man past point
back of length towards off, guides to point
accurate ball on length on the middle stump, Mominul defends it back
touch shorter and angled across, Mominul cuts it straight to point and is disappointed with himself for not finding the gap
back of length around off, defends it to short cover and it's drinks
drifting in from outside off, turned to the leg side for one
sweeps it form off straight to square leg
length ball outside off, cuts it late to short third man and Mushfiqur says no for the single
good-length ball drifting in outside off, defends it square of the wicket
fuller on middle, steered to the leg side for an easy single
short of length outside off, Mushfiqur goes back and cuts it to deep point for one
length ball outside off, defends with soft hands towards cover for a quick single
strays down the leg side for a wide
full on the off stump, solid defence back to the bowler
on the middle stump on length, he tries to whip it on leg but manages an edge onto his pads
full on leg, whipped straight to midwicket this time
back of length on middle, turned to deep midwicket where there is a fumble but they are happy with one
on length outside off, jabbed towards point and they steal a quick single

oh Nabi has struck with some sharp turn, stunned silence in the ground! He flighted it by pitching it just outside off, Mushfiqur was on the move as he tried to turn it to leg but missed and was struck in front of the off stump for a loud appeal as the ball turned and the finger went up. The captain has to go back
flights it again and it turns too, but Nasir blocks it back
on length outside off, pushed to short cover
touch wider outside off, pushed towards point for a quick single
full on off, drives it down to long-off for one
on length on the off stump, the batsman defends it back
on the leg stump, tucked to square leg for one
slightly flatter on middle, Nasir pushes it back
keeps low this time after pitching outside off, bottom edge goes back to the bowler
short of length outside off, cut straight to point

that's gone high in the air but he's been dropped! He tried to pull a ball that was turning away from him and the leading edge went high towards backward point, who came running in and dived forward unnecessarily to drop it despite making it on time. The fielder was Asghar Stanikzai
outside off and pushed towards cover point
short ball and that's been put away to the backward square leg boundary with a pull for four
on length outside off, defends it back
coming in from length, keeps low and he cuts it to point
on length around middle, defends it back to the bowler
touch shorter outside off, Mominul cuts it late delicately for a single to short third man
full on leg, flicked away easily to deep midwicket
short of length on middle, turned to midwicket
on length outside off, pushed towards cover
towards leg this time and he drives it down to long-on
on length on off, he defends it back
on length on middle stump, turned to square leg for an easy run
turning in from length around off, steered to short fine leg for one
that's gone in the air, Nasir drove it on the up against the turn but the ball fell well short of long-on and they take two
flighted outside off, slogged down to mid-on
short ball outside off, he pulls it to mid-on
dropped again, by the bowler this time. Nasir smashed the half-volley back to the bowler, he got his hands to it but couldn't hold on it. It was struck with a lot of power
flighted outside off, blasted straight to cover. Nasir wanted to hit almost every ball of that over out of the park
on length on leg, steered to deep midwicket for one
flighted on off, driven past cover for one to long-off
on length on off stump, defended back to the bowler
back of length around off, turned to square leg and Mominul brings up his fifty off 71 balls
flighted around off on length, pushed straight to cover
short of length ball keeps low outside off, slapped back past the bowler to long-on
short and flat around off, pulled straight to mid-on
short of length around off, turned to the leg side for one

that's gone through Mominul, Shenwari gets rid of the set batsman! He sent down a legspinner around off, Mominul came down the track to drive but missed the line of the ball because of the turn and the ball hit the middle stump. The umpires are checking for the no ball now, no angles are conclusive because there are fielders on either side of the pitch blocking the path of the cameras. So we can't see clearly where the foot lands, but he seems fine and Mominul walks back
turning away form length outside off, drives it straight to cover
flighted on leg, sharp turn and leading edge goes to the off side
pitched up on off, drives it straight to cover
back of length outside off, cut off the backfoot to deep point
flighted on middle, he comes down and drives to long-off
keeps low after pitching on off and the batsman manages to get bat just in time
short of length outside off, cut to sweeper cover off the backfoot
angled in from wide of the crease, defended back to the bowler
turning away from length outside off, he comes down and defends
short of length outside off, turned to the leg side for one
comes down and drives the full toss back to the bowler
drifting in towards leg, drives it inside out to cover
on leg stump and sharp turn gets a leading edge towards third man
touch fuller outside of, driven down easily to long-off
almost a yorker pushed to long-off for one
stays on the back foot and cuts to cover
slightly slower and he defends it towards cover for one
tries to cut off the backfoot but misses
short of length outside off, cut to deep cover for one
full on middle, drives it down to long-on
on length around off, drives it straight to cover
poor delivery, short ball turning away and he only slaps it back to the bowler
flighted on off, driven to cover
touch shorter around middle and he turns it to leg for one
short ball on leg, he pulls it to deep midwicket for one
dropped again, it was another tough one as the batsman smashed it back to the bowler and he couldn't hold on to it
length delivery on the stumps, defends it back to the bowler
on length outside off, he comes down and pushes the ball to cover for one
goes to the backfoot and cuts the ball from outside off to deep cover
punched off the backfoot to long-off for one
drives the length ball on off down to long-off
short er ball and it's cut straight to cover
comes down the track and drives it to long-off for one
short ball outside off, pulled to deep midwicket for two easy runs
flighted around off, comes down and defends
comes down again to push it wide of point for one
on length on off, drives it down to long-on for one
pushed back to the bowler from length on off
flighted on middle, drives it down to long-off for one
length ball outside off, drives it down to mid-off
on middle and leg, steered towards backward square leg for one
short of length on middle, turned to square leg for one more
short of length outside off, he tries to cut and misses
angled in from short of length, driven down to long-on for one
even shorter on middle, tucked to midwicket for a single to end the over
poor delivery - it was short and down the leg side, Nasir came down and slept it wide of short fine leg for four
short of length ball outside off, cut to point
on the leg stump again, pushed towards midwicket for one
comes down the track and drives it to long-off
gets a bottom edge while cutting the delivery outside off
short of length around off, turned to the leg side for one more
short of length outside off, cut fiercely to third man
on length outside off, drives off the backfoot to mid-off
short of length and nipping in form outside off, cut straight to backward point
short of length on middle, keeps low and defended to midwicket
nipping in again from length around off, thick bottom edge goes towards midwicket
short of length ball angled in, he guides it to point for one
back of length outside off, cut to sweeper cover off the backfoot and they ran very hard to complete the second on time
on length on the off side, driven down to long-off
short of length around off, drives it past cover to long-off
flighted on off, driven inside out straight to cover
short of length around off, guides it to cover point
short of length on leg, pushed down to long-on for one and it's time for drinks again
turning in form off, pushed to cover
on length around middle, steered to midwicket
drives the fuller ball down to long-on
back of length and turning in form off, steered to backward square leg
turns in from length, pushed back to the bowler
slightly wide outside off, the batsman frees his arms with a powerful drive and mid-off misfields and concedes four runs. That makes it six form the over, not two
short of length and angled in, cuts it late to third man
almost in the block hole, digs it out down the ground towards mid-on for one
wider outside off, drives it powerfully but straight to cover at the edge of the circle
short of length outside off, guides it to third man for one more and that's the 50 partnership
length ball outside off, pushed to cover easily for a single
full around off, smashed down the ground and mid-off dives to stop it but they take one
futile lbw appeal as the batsman was hit in front of leg and it was going down leg, they take a leg bye
fuller outside off, pushed towards mid-off for one

dropped and that's six! Nasir dropped for the fourth time in the match. He came down the track and lofted it towards long-on, there was a fielder there but he misjudged it and the ball went right through hands and outside the boundary rope
turning in around middle, defends it to midwicket
on length outside off, driven down to mid-off
comes down and drives to long-on for one
short of length outside off, cut late to third man for one
half-volley outside off and Naeem drives with power just wide of mid-off where the tall Shapoor Zadran dives to his left but can't get a hand to it
wide down the leg side and far from the keeper which gives the batsmen byes too
another wide down the leg side, Afghanistan feeling the pressure?
on length on middle, defends towards midwicket for a single
on length outside off, slammed down to long-on, but not from the middle of the bat
short of length and angled in towards off, defended back to the bowler

fifth catch offered by Nasir and this time it's taken! It was a short of length ball well outside off, Nasir stayed back and chopped it straight into the hands of Shenwari at backward point. Big wicket for Afghanistan
around length on off, the batsman makes some room and drives it to cover for one
full toss on leg and Ziaur steers it off the pads to deep fine leg to get off the mark
right on target - on the off stump on length and it's defended back

one more wicket falls in the Powerplay! Naeem came down the track and drove the length ball powerfully towards mid-off where Nawroz Mangal dived to his right for a good catch. It was going fast and flat

full delivery is driven down the ground and mid-off cuts it to one. Oh wait, he has a direct hit and looks like the batsman was lazy to make his ground. Bowden refers to third umpire. Replays show Razzak did not ground his bat even though he had made it and his bat was in the air when the ball hit the stumps. That's very irresponsible from a player who has played nearly 150 ODIs
oh three wickets in three balls! Zadran pitched it down leg and Sunny wanted to play it off his hips but only managed a thin edge to the keeper who goes up, and so does the umpire's finger
full on the off stump, defended towards mid-on
short of length and well outside off, helps it to third man for one
bit of extra bounce as the back of length ball rises and the defence goes to point
short ball and it's pulled from the middle of the bat to deep midwicket
short of length outside off, defends it to cover off the backfoot
length delivery right on the off stump, defends it back to the bowler
charges down the track and dispatches it for four! It was on length around off and he launched it to the wide long-on boundary for a one-bounce four
good-length ball outside off, pushed straight to cover
pulled again and another four! It was a short ball towards middle and leg, and Ziaur got into a good position to pull it far from deep square leg for four
and that's huge, this time he goes all the way. Makes a bit of room and lofts it over long-off for a clean six. 14 from the over and one ball to go

a thick top edge off the short ball goes towards deep square leg, there is a fielder there and oh it's gone through his legs. This is not what Afghanistan want right now. That makes it 18 from from the over
length ball outside off, guides it to third man to give strike to Ziaur Rahman
136kph, short ball angled in towards the batsman. He defends it on the off side

that's gone very very high and lands safe. Ziaur pulled the short ball, got a leading edge and it got lost in the sky before falling in no man's land just before the square leg boundary and they take two to bring Ziaur back on strike
driven firmly down the ground to long-on but they don't run, Ziaur wants to be on strike
loud appeal for lbw as Ziaur slogged and it hit him in front of leg stump, but was going down with the angle. No time for the leg bye
defends the ball outside off with an edge, it's close to the stumps and they sneak a single as the keeper is far back and the bowler can't make it

there are three fielders in the deep on leg and Ziaur lofts it beautifully over the long-off boundary for a six! He made some room and took the risk because there was a long-off fielder, he also hit it wide of him
short of length on off, defends it back to the bowler

he's hit it straight to the fielder who has to come in to catch it, but he can't!! Ziaur slog-swept the ball from off to deep midwicket and the fielder could have taken it but it went through his hands well inside the boundary and went for four
pushes the ball from off to point

gets the of stump! Nabi has done it, Ziaur took a step down to drive it on off, the ball spun in from just outside off and went through Ziaur's gate to hit the off stump. Afghanistan celebrate, onre wicket to go
low full toss outside off, driven straight to the fielder
can't middle the short ball, but he gets enough to pull it to the leg side for two
short of length and width on offer, slapped past short cover in the air and he pierces the gap for four
edged and goes just past the keeper! He slashed at the ball outside off, got an outside edge and it went to the right of the keeper for four
full delivery outside off, driven to cover for a quick single
full toss is edged to the keeper but lands in front of him
flighted delivery on off, defended off the front foot
short of length ball steered to deep backward square leg for one
turns the length ball on off towards midwicket
flat and short of length on off, whipped to deep midwicket for one more
another dot ball as he defends it back to Nabi
fuller on off, turned to midwicket from off and that's just three singles in the over
full ball on off, driven down to mid-off
low full toss outside off, drives to cover but can't middle it
almost in the block hole outside off, jabbed to point for a quick single
just past the outside edge as Sohag poked but missed. Oh wait, the keeper passed the ball to his team-mate and they still ran a bye, but the umpire says the ball was dead by then
tries to drive outside off but misses again
full toss outside off, he takes the injured hand off the bat and no time for a single as he jabs to point. Just one from the over
length ball from Nabi, Rubel looks to swipe that out of the ground, can only get it as far as short fine leg
drilled towards long-off this time for a single
full toss on the pads, pushed towards midwicket
it's all over, Afghanistan have won, a landmark day for their cricket, the final wicket came after a swipe to midwicket, fielder gets under it and there's no fumbling this time
